atk1-text: Roll KEN + TR vs. KEN + SR against an adjacent insect. The target gains wounds equal to the net successes. This attack ignores Carapace.
atk2-text: Roll SPE + TR vs. SPE + SR against an adjacent insect. The target gains wounds equal to the net successes. On a success, you move up to your SPE.
atk3-text: Roll WEB + TR vs. SPE + SR against an insect up to 4 hexes away. The target gains wounds and Immobilised equal to the net successes.
atk4-text: Roll Venom + TR vs. STR + SR against an adjacent insect. The target gains Wounds and Infected equal to the net successes.
